title: "UK police lack framework for adopting new tech like AI and face recognition, Lords told"
excerpt: "UK police forces have no overarching rules for introducing controversial technologies like AI and facial recognition, the House of Lords has heard. Baroness Shackleton of the Lords' Justice and Home Affairs Committee said the group had found 30 organisations with some role in determining how the police use new technologies,"
